name: How To Human
description:
This was a project for my team's senior capstone course. It's available to play, hope you enjoy it! 

How to Human is a lighthearted and silly adventure game, featuring Bigfoot as the main character! In a world where Bigfoot is able to live in secret alongside humankind, join him on a mission to complete his final challenge – to take the bus into the city to start his new life. Watch him dress the part, charm the world with his words, and prepare food like no other, when Bigfoot learns How to Human!
